original_text: He considered the reproach of Christ greater wealth than the treasures of Egypt, for he was looking to the reward.
korean_text: 그리스도를 위하여 받는 수모를 애굽의 모든 보화보다 더 큰 재물로 여겼으니 이는 상 주심을 바라봄이라

sentences.original_text: He considered the reproach of Christ
greater wealth than the treasures of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽의 보물보다 더 큰 재물로 여겼습니다

sentences.original_text: for he was looking to the reward.
